articles.title: Singaporean couple's 8-day South Korea trip turns into 7-day quarantine stay thanks to Covid-19 - AsiaOne

articles.title: Cameron's big final quarter sees Tall Blacks into Asia Cup semis - 1News
articles.description: The Tall Blacks outscored South Korea 28-18 in the final quarter to win 88-78, with Flynn Cameron contributing half of his team's scoring in that time.
articles.content:
The Tall Blacks have booked a trans-Tasman clash in the Asia Cup playoffs after taking down South Korea in the quarter-finals on Friday morning.
